import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const{id, title, place, photo, price, featured, reviews}= tour const{} =calculateAvgRating(reviews) // const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc, item)=> acc+item.rating, 0) // const avgRating= totalRating ==0 ? '' : totalRating ==1? totalRating : (totalRating/ reviews?.length ).toFixed(1) return (
{/* Featured */}
{place} {avgRating ==0? null: avgRating} {totalRating==0? 'No Ratings' :({reviews.length}) }
{title}
â‚¹{price} /per adult
) } export default TourCard
